name: squarespace-webpack-boilerplate
description: A webpack boilerplate for building Squarespace templates

scripts.build:css: npm run build:css-main ; npm run build:css-crit
scripts.build:css-crit: lessc $npm_package_config_less_crit_file $npm_package_config_css_crit_file && gulp critical && npm run clean:crit
scripts.build:src-temp: npm run clean:src-temp && cp -av ./src/template.conf ./src/template/ ; cp -av ./src/assets/. ./src/template/assets ; cp -av ./src/blocks/. ./src/template/blocks ; cp -av ./src/collections/. ./src/template/collections ; cp -av ./src/regions/. ./src/template && (cd ./src/template && find . -type f -name 'README.md' -ls -delete) && npm run build:js ; npm run build:css

author: mario.perez415@gmail.com
